snippet.title: Perspectives - Daniel Schmachtenberger, Fedor Holz
snippet.description:
Link to original: https://open.spotify.com/episode/0XKgMPTR4Rht5Qml4PCuuU?si=HE_YU_uEQHGb1LWdQqr4xg

Description from the guest's Facebook post about this interview: "Recent podcast on perspective seeking, certainty, epistemics, bias, power, institutional decision making, complexity, Covid response, game theory, sociopathy, virtue, communication, and the basis of motivation.

With Fedor Holz on his new podcast. His perspective, partially shaped by being one of the world's top poker players, is quite interesting - particularly how it shaped his feelings about game theory."

The playlist titled "Essentials at The Seeking" on this channel offers a collection of clips discussing what may be deemed some of the most fundamental concepts to our endeavor. 

Essentials at The Seeking playlist link: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLeRBa-Ner4BsP0ypB-FnB70-KiKZFtRpG

This youtube channel and its operators are not affiliated with the speakers in this interview. This interview was uploaded to YouTube for educational purposes only.
